job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI functionalities into a complete product, covering both front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the architectural design and coding of web applications, a fundamental software development task, with an explicit mention of AI integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle management and ownership, a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the idea that AI work must be integrated into the broader product, aligning with software integration principles.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for full-stack development and integration, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on building new applications and driving innovation, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development process of translating ideas into products, emphasizing full-stack capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working with specific AI technologies (LLMs) to create tools and features, which falls under model development and application of AI techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude indicates a focus on interacting with and leveraging these models, which is central to prompt engineering and GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase demonstrates an understanding of the business impact and user needs within the educational technology sector.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of understanding stakeholder needs and aligning technical solutions with business objectives in the educational context.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This task requires understanding the business goal of accelerating learning outcomes and applying AI to achieve it, demonstrating business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with diverse teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This directly addresses the need for effective communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the importance of collaboration with various roles to ensure product success.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need for continuous learning and staying updated with new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights taking full responsibility and ownership of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes taking ownership and driving technical projects from start to finish.

job_tasks.phrase: push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a drive for innovation and pushing limits.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (full-stack development, integration, ownership of the product lifecycle) and AI specialization tasks (working with LLMs like GPT-4/Claude, creating AI-powered features). The role requires integrating AI into the product rather than just building isolated AI models, and it explicitly mentions both front-end and back-end development, indicating a strong software engineering foundation augmented by GenAI skills. The profile is 'Core GenAI Engineer' because the AI focus is specifically on Generative AI (LLMs) and the role requires a blend of both software engineering and AI specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly stating the blend of full-stack software engineering and GenAI responsibilities. It also clearly defines what the role is NOT, which helps in precise classification. The mention of specific LLMs and the requirement for end-to-end product ownership leaves little room for ambiguity.
